content.name: Ship Test Field Gamestart
content.author: DrWhoKnows
content.description:
A gamestart with all blueprints and operational shipyard for quick test of mods and ships. Fast save and load. Recommend for use in combination with other mods that accelerate building time. Right click a station plot and select "instant build" to instantly build the station.
Nexus mod page: https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/772

text.name: Ship Test Site Gamestart
text.description: A place to test your new toys.
text.author: DrWhoKnows

text.name: 飞船试验场开局
text.description: 在这里测试你的新玩具。
text.author: DrWhoKnows

text.name: 飛船試驗場開局
text.description: 在這裡測試你的新玩具。
text.author: DrWhoKnows
